Package network.messages

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMessage
    Message
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptReplayMessage
    Message to be sent when accepting to replay a game
    AddNewTableMessage
    Message to be sent when add a new table
    AnswerStopGameMessage
    Message to be sent when aswer wether the game must be stopped or not
    AskJoinTableMessage
    Message to be sent when asking to join a table
    AskQuitTableMessage
    Message to be sent when asking to quit a table
    askRefreshUserListMessage
    Message to be sent when asking to refresh the list of users
    AskStopGameMessage
    Message to be sent when asking to stop a game
    ChangeStateMessage
    Message to be sent when the game changes state
    ChangeTurnStateMessage
    Message to be sent when the turn changes state
    ConnectionMessage
    Message to be sent when a player connects
    CreateTableMessage
    Message to be sent when creating a table
    ExAequoMessage
    Message to be sent if the game ends in a draw
    GetProfileMessage
    Message to be sent when retrieving a profile
    HasAcceptedMessage
    Message to be sent when a user accepts a player into the game
    HasLostMessage
    Message to be sent when a player has lost
    HasRefusedMessage
    Message to be sent if a player has refused another
    HasSelectedMessage
    Message to be sent when a player has selected die
    HasThrownMessage
    Message to be sent when a user has thrown some die
    HasWonMessage
    Message to be sent when a player has won a game
    IsTurnMessage
    Message to be sent to notify it is a certain player's turn
    KickedMessage
    Message to be sent when a player is kicked
    LaunchGameMessage
    Message to be sent when a game is launched
    LogoutUserRequestMessage
    Message to be sent when a user asks to logout
    NetworkChatMessage
    Message to be sent when a message is sent to the chat
    NewPlayerOnTableMessage
    Message to be sent when a new player joisn a table
    NewSpectatorOnTableMessage
    Message to be sent when a spectator joins the table
    NewUserMessage
    Message to be sent when a new user logs in
    PlayerQuitGameMessage
    Message to be sent when a players quits the game
    QuitGameMessage
    Message to be sent when a player quits a game
    RaiseExceptionMessage
    Message to be sent when a exception is being raised
    refreshUserListMessage
    Message to be sent when the list of users is refreshed
    RefuseReplayMessage
    Message being sent when a user refuses to replay
    SelectDiceMessage
    Message to be sent when a player selects die
    SendProfileMessage
    Message to be sent when sending a profile
    SendTableInfoMessage
    Message to be sent when sending a table's info
    SetCreatorMessage
    Message to be sent when setting the creator of a table
    SetSelectionMessage
    Message to be sent when selecting die
    ShowTimerMessage
    Message to be sent to show the timer
    StartTurnMessage
    Message to start a turn
    StopGameMessage
    Message to be sent when stopping a game
    TablesUsersListMessage
    Message to be sent to refresh all tables and users
    ThrowDiceMessage
    Message to be sent when throwing die
    UpdateChipsChargeMessage
    Message to be sent to update the number of chips during the charge
    UpdateChipsDechargeMessage
    Message to be sent when updating the number of chips during the decharge
    UpdateProfileMessage
    Message to be sent when updating a profile
    UpdateTableInfoMessage
    Message to be sent when update the info of a table
